title: Seven
description: A seasoned homicide detective and his new partner are on a desperate hunt for a killer whose gruesome crimes are based on the Seven Deadly Sins.
actors: Brad Pitt, Morgan Freeman, Gwyneth Paltrow, Kevin Spacey

title: Schindler's List
description: Oskar Schindler becomes an unlikely humanitarian, spending his entire fortune to help save 1,100 Jews from Auschwitz during World War II.
actors: Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley, Ralph Fiennes, Caroline Goodall

title: V for Vendetta
description: A masked freedom fighter known as "V" takes up arms against a totalitarian government and finds an unlikely ally in a young woman.
actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry

title: Once Upon a Time in America
description: Director Sergio Leone's sprawling crime epic follows a group of Jewish mobsters who rise in the ranks of organized crime in 1920s New York City.
actors: Robert De Niro, James Woods, Elizabeth McGovern, Treat Williams

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A drugs deal gone bad and a bag full of cash entwine an unsuspecting hunter, a veteran sheriff and a murderous hit man in the stark West Texas desert.
actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson

title: Nymphomaniac: Volume 1
description: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac reveals a lifetime of sexual experiences to a man who saves her from being beaten in an alley.
actors: Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgård, Stacy Martin, Shia LaBeouf

title: Nymphomaniac: Volume II
description: The second half of Lars von Trier's epic follows Joe as her reignited sex addiction destroys her family and thrusts her toward a surprising new trade.
actors: Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgård, Stacy Martin, Shia LaBeouf

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
description: An assassin is shot by her ruthless employer, Bill, and other members of their assassination circle. But she lives -- and plots her vengeance.
actors: Uma Thurman, Lucy Liu, Vivica A. Fox, Daryl Hannah

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
description: The Bride has three left on her rampage list: Budd, Elle Driver and Bill himself. But when she arrives at Bill's house, she's in for a surprise.
actors: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Michael Madsen, Daryl Hannah

title: Berlin Calling
description: DJ Ickarus is at the top of his game, dazzling fans and touring the world -- until he gets locked in the loony bin after taking a few too many drugs.
actors: Paul Kalkbrenner, Rita Lengyel, Corinna Harfouch, Araba Walton

title: Newness
description: Martin and Gabi try to form a relationship after meeting through a hookup app, but when boredom creeps in, they seek out an unconventional solution.
actors: Nicholas Hoult, Laia Costa, Danny Huston, Courtney Eaton

title: The Aviator
description: Leonardo DiCaprio portrays eccentric tycoon Howard Hughes, who turned a small fortune into a massive one by building Hollywood and aviation empires.
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Cate Blanchett, Kate Beckinsale, John C. Reilly
